mapper.sql: ACTUAL_END_DT, ACTUAL_START_DT, AMT, AMT_CS, AMT_USD, AMT_VDC, AMT_VERIFY_FLAG, BILL_PERIOD_FROM, BILL_PERIOD_TO, CURRENCY, CURRENT_MONTH, CUST_ID, INV_DESC_ID, INV_ID, INV_VERSION, ITEM_DESC, PAYMENT_ITEM_CODE, PRICE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from INV_ITEM_DESC
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into INV_ITEM_DESC (ACTUAL_END_DT, ACTUAL_START_DT, AMT, AMT_CS, AMT_USD, AMT_VDC, AMT_VERIFY_FLAG, BILL_PERIOD_FROM, BILL_PERIOD_TO, CURRENCY, CURRENT_MONTH, CUST_ID, INV_DESC_ID, INV_ID, INV_VERSION, ITEM_DESC, PAYMENT_ITEM_CODE, PRICE ) values (#{actualEndDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actualStartDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amtCs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amtUsd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amtVdc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amtVerifyFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billPeriodFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billPeriodTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invDescId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

ACTUAL_END_DT,
ACTUAL_START_DT,
AMT,

mapper.update:
update INV_ITEM_DESC
ACTUAL_END_DT = #{record.actualEndDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACTUAL_START_DT = #{record.actualStartDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AMT = #{record.amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMT_CS = #{record.amtCs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMT_USD = #{record.amtUsd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMT_VDC = #{record.amtVdc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMT_VERIFY_FLAG = #{record.amtVerifyFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILL_PERIOD_FROM = #{record.billPeriodFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILL_PERIOD_TO = #{record.billPeriodTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENCY = #{record.currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_MONTH = #{record.currentMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_ID = #{record.custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INV_DESC_ID = #{record.invDescId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INV_ID = #{record.invId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INV_VERSION = #{record.invVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ITEM_DESC = #{record.itemDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYMENT_ITEM_CODE = #{record.paymentItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update INV_ITEM_DESC set ACTUAL_END_DT = #{record.actualEndDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACTUAL_START_DT = #{record.actualStartDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AMT = #{record.amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMT_CS = #{record.amtCs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMT_USD = #{record.amtUsd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMT_VDC = #{record.amtVdc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMT_VERIFY_FLAG = #{record.amtVerifyFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_PERIOD_FROM = #{record.billPeriodFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_PERIOD_TO = #{record.billPeriodTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENCY = #{record.currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_MONTH = #{record.currentMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_ID = #{record.custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INV_DESC_ID = #{record.invDescId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INV_ID = #{record.invId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INV_VERSION = #{record.invVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_DESC = #{record.itemDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYMENT_ITEM_CODE = #{record.paymentItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
